explanation: [0-0] LeBron James, wearing a yellow jersey with white and purple patterns, a yellow wristband on his left hand, and a white protective sleeve on his right hand, is standing by the sidelines of a basketball court. He is holding a container of rosin powder in his left hand and pouring the white powder into his right hand. Three people are standing behind him, all wearing dark tops and pants, with tattoos on their arms. There is a person wearing a gray hat in the lower left corner of the screen.

[0-3] LeBron James continues to pour the rosin powder. At this moment, a pair of hands appear on the right, rubbing the pile of rosin powder on the table. A man behind him is holding a roll of cable and stepping back. Then LeBron James scoops up a handful of rosin powder in his right hand, cups his hands together, and throws the powder upwards, scattering it in the air. LeBron James looks up, his eyes following the powder scattered in the air. At this time, the white subtitle "S##T!" appears on the right side of the screen. Behind LeBron James is a black man wearing a black turtleneck, a gold watch, and dreadlocks, shaking his hand from time to time. There are three other staff members filming behind, and a person wearing khaki pants and a black and white top walks by in the distance.

[3-7] LeBron James chases after a basketball flying towards the edge of the court, trying to stop it from going out of bounds with his left hand. However, the basketball hits his leg and bounces into the audience. At the same time, LeBron James also loses control and rushes towards the audience, his body first hitting the back of the seat and the basketball, then rolling over and falling to the ground on his back. At this time, there are many spectators sitting in the audience.

[7-12] LeBron James dribbles with his right hand and runs towards the hoop, preparing for a layup. There is a teammate behind him, and an opponent following the teammate. There is also an opponent on LeBron James’ right side who is trying to stop him. LeBron James then holds the basketball with both hands and turns to the left to dodge, but in the process, he bumps into the opponent who came to intercept him. The opponents are all wearing black jerseys with white text and patterns. The camera switches, and the opponent who was hit by LeBron James falls to the ground face up, legs up in the air. At this time, LeBron James has run under the backboard. There are two teammates and four opponents around him, all looking at the basketball. LeBron James jumps high and successfully dunks with his right hand. The falling basketball hits his leg and bounces away. There is a referee wearing a black and white top, black pants and black shoes standing under the backboard. The audience behind is full of people, some of whom are taking pictures.

[12-15] LeBron James stands outside the free throw line, ready to shoot. There are several photographers sitting cross-legged behind him, and in front of him is an opponent with his hands raised ready to block the shot. LeBron James raises the basketball over his head with both hands and then shoots it out forcefully. The basketball flies over half the court, and a nearby opponent jumps up and tries to catch the ball with his left hand, but his hand touches the basketball and makes it bounce farther away. At this time, a teammate appears on the right side of the screen, and both of them run towards the ball.

[24-26] LeBron James and a man wearing a black top and black pants walk forward side by side. The background is relatively dark, and there is a glowing screen on the left side of the tunnel.
